hymn.title: I've tried in vain a thousand ways

layout.singingstanza: I've tried in vain a thou -- sand ways My fears to quell, my hopes to raise; But what I need, the Bi -- ble says, Is ev -- er, on -- ly Je -- sus.

lyrics.stanza: I've tried in vain a thousand ways My fears to quell, my hopes to raise; But what I need, the Bible says, Is ever, only Jesus.
Though some should sneer, and some should blame, I'll go with all my guilt and shame; I'll go to Him because His name, Above all names, is Jesus.
